DOC.brief_title: Radiofrequency Treatment Peripheral Vascular Occlusive Disease Lower Extremities
DOC.criteria: Patient ≥18 year age Patient Rutherford category 24 De novo lesion SFA popliteal artery diameter stenosis ≥50 % Target lesion de novo occlusion successfully predilated result lesion < 99 % Target lesion stenosis length ≤100 mm base visual assessment Target vessel reference diameter ≥3.0 mm ≤7.0 mm base visual assessment Angiographic evidence distal runoff define minimum one ( 1 ) patent tibial artery straight flow foot Patient willing able provide write informed consent prior study specific procedure Patient willing able comply specify followup evaluation specify time Any prior intervention intend target lesion include 10 mm proximal distal intend treatment area Evidence thrombus target vessel Prior ipsilateral contralateral low limb arterial bypass Treatment ipsilateral lesion index procedure plan treatment index procedure Target lesion severely calcify Any known allergy / intolerance follow : ASA , Clopidogrel , Heparin , contrast agent ( adequately premedicated ) . Any planned surgery within 30 day study procedure . Renal failure ( serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL ) Female childbearing potential without negative pregnancy test Patient organ transplant Patient currently participate investigational drug device study reach primary endpoint yet clinically interfere endpoint study In investigator 's opinion , patient severe comorbid condition ( ) could limit ability participate study
